Interface IAttachable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AttachCorners, AttachNone, AttachSides
public interface IAttachable

An interface for encapsulating all strategies for calculating snap points of shapes

Version:
1.0.0.0
Author:
Justin Blakley & Carl Firestone

Method Summary
 double[] calculateAttachmentPoints(double x, double y, double dimX, double dimY)
          Calculates the snap points of a shape
 

Method Detail

calculateAttachmentPoints

double[] calculateAttachmentPoints(double x,
                                   double y,
                                   double dimX,
                                   double dimY)
Calculates the snap points of a shape

Parameters:
x - The x-Coordinate
y - The y-Coordinate
dimX - The x-based dimension
dimY - The y-based dimension
Returns:
The base 4 indexed array of data used to create the snap points
